BR_text.BRdescription:
Hello,
 In the documentation of knn, it is said that : we can choose an algorithm between BallTree, KDTree ,brute-force and auto.
 However, The Ball Tree structure is always applied with  decision_function() :
 If we train a knn with X_train and the algorithm parameter set to KDTree :
 It will evaluate decision_score on X_test with a Ball Tree.
 Could you modify the code to allow the use of KDTree or brut-force on the testing dataset.

comments_0.comment_text:
Thanks for spotting this. This inconsistency is caused by fixing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yzhao062/pyod/issues/23>#23</denchmark-link>
  .
 We now force the kNN model to use ball tree to be compatible with more distance metrics. I will update the documentation (and code) soon.
 Thanks again.
 Yue
